text:
We are now offering the Moderna COVID-19 vaccine daily at the following store locations: Aiken, Pelion, Camden, Lugoff, Winnsboro, Taylor Street - Columbia, and Sunset Blvd. - West Columbia. Walk-ins are welcome!
